## MapViewFog.(constructor)

Constructs a `MapViewFog` instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(m_scene: THREE.Scene);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m\_scene | THREE.Scene | The scene used in \[\[MapView\]\] that contains the map objects. |
